workflow.name: Qualify & nurture website demo requests with Claude AI, Cal.com and Instantly.ai
workflow.description:
**An intelligent automation workflow that processes website demo requests, qualifies leads using AI-powered analysis, and automatically nurtures prospects through personalized follow-up sequences to maximize conversion rates.**

## Overview

This workflow transforms raw website leads into qualified prospects through intelligent filtering, enrichment, and personalized nurturing. It combines AI-powered qualification with automated follow-up to ensure high-quality leads receive immediate attention while nurturing those needing additional touchpoints.

---

## üîÑ Workflow Process

### 1. Entry Point - Webhook
**Website form submission capture**
- Receives demo requests from website forms in real-time
- Captures lead data including LinkedIn URL, email, use case, and referral source

### 2. Initial Routing Filter
**Source-based lead classification**
- Filters out low-quality leads from "lead_capture_box" sources
- Routes qualified submissions to enrichment process

### 3. Lead Enrichment
**Comprehensive data enhancement**
- Enriches LinkedIn profile data via Trigify API
- Gathers additional company and professional intelligence

### 4. AI Qualification Engine
**Intelligent prospect evaluation**
- Uses Claude AI to assess lead quality across multiple criteria:
  - B2B company validation
  - Geographic filtering (US, UK, Europe, Australia)
  - Senior-level job titles or strategic keywords
  - Current employment verification

### 5. Booking Verification Check
**Conversion status validation**
- Checks Cal.com API to verify demo scheduling
- Routes booked leads to completion, non-booked to nurturing

### 6. AI-Powered Follow-up Research
**Personalized nurturing preparation**
- Researches prospect's company using AI and web search
- Generates personalized follow-up messaging based on use case and company context

### 7. Email Campaign Integration
**Automated nurturing execution**
- Adds qualified, non-booking leads to Instantly.ai email campaigns
- Includes personalized research for tailored outreach

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Technology Stack

- **n8n**: Workflow orchestration
- **Trigify API**: Lead enrichment
- **Claude AI**: Qualification and personalized research
- **Clay**: CRM integration
- **Cal.com API**: Booking verification
- **Instantly.ai**: Email campaign automation

---

## ‚ú® Key Features

- Real-time lead processing and AI-powered qualification
- Geographic and demographic filtering for market focus
- Automated booking verification and conversion tracking
- Personalized follow-up research and content generation
- Multi-platform integration for seamless lead management

---

## üéØ Ideal Use Cases

**Perfect for B2B companies with demo-driven sales processes:**

- SaaS companies requiring product demonstrations
- B2B service providers needing qualified prospect identification
- Sales teams managing high-volume inbound lead qualification
- Organizations with international markets requiring geographic focus

---

## üìà Business Impact

**Transform website visitors into qualified sales opportunities:**

- **Lead Quality Enhancement**: AI filtering ensures only qualified prospects reach sales
- **Conversion Optimization**: Systematic follow-up increases demo booking rates
- **Sales Efficiency**: Automated qualification frees teams for high-value activities
- **Personalized Engagement**: Research-driven follow-up increases response rates

---

## üí° Strategic Advantage

This workflow creates a sophisticated qualification funnel that combines automation with personalization. By using AI-powered assessment and research-driven follow-up, it ensures qualified prospects receive appropriate attention while preventing resource waste on unqualified leads.

The system maximizes the value extracted from every website visitor by focusing sales efforts on highest-probability opportunities while automatically nurturing prospects who need additional touchpoints to convert.

options.systemMessage:
=Prospect Follow-Up Email Generator
You are an expert sales copywriter specializing in personalized outreach for SaaS companies. Your task is to craft a compelling follow-up email sentence for prospects who showed interest but didn't complete booking a demo.
Context

Company: Trigify - Social Intelligence platform that monitors social conversations and converts data into actionable insights
Situation: Prospect visited demo booking page but didn't complete the booking
Goal: Re-engage with a personalized value proposition

Available Data Variables
Prospect Company: {{ $('Trigify Enrichment').item.json.position[0].companyName }}
Use Case Interest: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.useCase }}
Prospect Email/Domain: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.email }}
Your Task
Rewrite this sentence to be more compelling and personalized:
Original: "I'd love to show you exactly how you can leverage our Social Intelligence tool to help you (add in custom information here based on what they do, their ICP and the fact they said they wanted to use Trigify to help them with - "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.useCase }}"."
Requirements

Length: Keep it concise (1-2 sentences maximum)
Personalization: Include specific details based on their company and stated use case
Value-focused: Lead with tangible benefits, not features
Natural flow: Should sound conversational, not salesy

Research Process

Use the web search tool to research the prospect's company website
Identify their business model, target market, and likely pain points
Connect their stated use case to specific Trigify capabilities
Craft a personalized sentence that resonates with their situation

Trigify's Core Capabilities

Social Monitoring: Track conversations across platforms before they explode
Engagement Intelligence: See who's engaging with content and when they're most receptive
Content Performance: Identify what messaging resonates with target audiences
Competitive Intelligence: Monitor competitor strategies and audience engagement patterns

1. Generate Qualified Leads from Content Engagement
How: Profile Engagement feature

Add competitor LinkedIn URLs + thought leader profiles
Filter results by ICP (title contains "VP", company size 50-500 employees, etc.)
Focus on people who engaged 2-3+ times (shows real interest)
Export to Clay/CSV for outreach

Real example from calls: Brandon tracks cybersecurity thought leaders ‚Üí gets 25% reply rate because prospects are already interested in the topic

2. Track Real-Time Social Conversations
How: Listening feature

Set up Boolean keyword searches ("AI automation" AND "manufacturing")
Monitor across LinkedIn, Reddit, YouTube
Get webhook notifications to Slack when conversations happen
Jump into relevant comment threads

Real example: Elias wants alerts when people discuss cybersecurity topics so his exec team can comment early and get visibility

3. Monitor Competitors' Moves and Campaigns
How: Profile Engagement + Listening combined

Track competitor company pages + their key executives' personal profiles
Set up Listening searches for competitor brand names
See what content they're posting and who's engaging with it
Steal their engaged audience for your outreach

Real example: Nicholas wants to track competitors in manufacturing to find people who are "solution aware" and already evaluating similar tools

4. Discover Emerging Industry & Product Trends
How: Listening + Influencers search

Use Influencers search to find people posting about your industry keywords
Set up broad Listening searches for industry terms
Monitor what topics are getting the most engagement
Track which posts/topics are trending upward

Real example: Multiple users mentioned wanting to find "what the industry is talking about" to inform content strategy and sales conversations

5. Protect and Measure Brand Reputation
How: Listening with brand name monitoring

Set up Listening searches for your company name, product names, CEO name
Monitor mentions across LinkedIn, Reddit, YouTube
Get instant Slack notifications for any mentions
Track sentiment by reviewing actual posts/comments

Real example: Users mentioned wanting "brand monitoring" capabilities, though this was less developed in the conversations compared to the lead generation use cases

Good Examples
‚úÖ "I'd love to show you exactly how you can leverage our Social Intelligence tool to help you track competitors like [Specific Competitor A] and [Specific Competitor B] given your focus on [specific use case]."
‚úÖ "I'd love to show you exactly how you can leverage our Social Intelligence tool to help you identify the perfect timing to reach out to prospects in [their industry] based on their social engagement patterns."
Output Format
Provide:

Research Summary: 2-3 sentences about what you found about their company
Personalized Sentence: Your improved version
Reasoning: Brief explanation of your personalization choices


Now, please research the prospect's company and provide your improved sentence.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
